title: VOD/SVOD - Completion Tracking
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in to the app
custom_steps: WHEN a user plays VOD/SVOD content
custom_expected:
THEN the following tracking messages should appear in both the logcat (filter by "tracking") and in Charles (from https://mlb.sc.omtrdc.net):
MLB.TV : [device name] : Video Player : Video Start
MLB.TV :  [device name] : Video Player : Video 25% Complete
MLB.TV :  [device name] : Video Player : Video 50% Complete
MLB.TV :  [device name] : Video Player : Video 75% Complete
MLB.TV :  [device name] : Video Player : Video Complete
NOTE: Completion events are fired when video is 98% complete

AND the media id should appear in the contentId field
AND the video type (VOD, SVOD, ARCHIVED, etc..) should appear in the contentType field

title: Media Player
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is in the app
custom_steps: WHEN a user is selecting and playing the selected feed
custom_expected:
THEN the following tracking actions should appear in logcat (filter by "Track Requesting") and Charles (https://mlb.sc.omtrdc.net) at the correct time:
MLB.TV : <Platform Name> : Feed Select Modal
MLB.TV : <Platform Name> : Feed Select Modal : <Feed Name> Click
MLB.TV : <Platform Name> : Feed Select Modal : Resume Click
MLB.TV : <Platform Name> : Feed Select Modal : Upgrade MLB.TV Click
MLB.TV : <Platform Name> : Feed Select Modal : Open Youtube Click
MLB.TV : <Platform Name> : Video Player : Closed Caption <text of option selected> Select
MLB.TV : <Platform Name> : Video Player : <Video Options|Audio Options> Click
MLB.TV : <Platform Name> : Video Player : Audio Feed Select
MLB.TV : <Platform Name> : Video Player : Video Feed Select
MLB.TV : <Platform Name> : Video Player : <Play|Pause|Fast Forward|Rewind> Press
AND video.videoFeedName is populated with text of the video feed selected
AND video.audioFeedName is populated with text of the audio feed selected
AND video.audioFeedState is populated with either "default" or "alternate" depending on what is selected
AND game.pk and stream.matchup are populated with their matching values

More information can be found here: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1fpRu27ySNv879rsKQ8po77F9ug-mIn6W-0tZXEFxZJA/edit#gid=225214161

title: Home Page
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is in the app
custom_steps: WHEN a user is making selections from the homepage
custom_expected:
THEN the following tracking actions should appear in logcat (filter by "Track Requesting") and Charles (https://mlb.sc.omtrdc.net) at the correct time:
pageName: MLB.TV : <Platform Name> : Home
action: MLB.TV : <Platform Name> : Home : Highlights : Neil Walker's solo home run Click (video title will match clicked title)
action: MLB.TV : <Platform Name> : Home : Games : Game Select Click 

More information can be found here: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1fpRu27ySNv879rsKQ8po77F9ug-mIn6W-0tZXEFxZJA/edit#gid=225214161

title: Onboarding
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is in the app
custom_steps: WHEN a user is performing onboarding actions
custom_expected:
THEN the following tracking actions should appear in logcat (filter by "Track Requesting") and Charles (https://mlb.sc.omtrdc.net) at the correct time:
pageName: MLB.TV : Amazon Fire TV : Get Started
action: MLB.TV : Amazon Fire TV : Get Started : Have An MLB Account Click
action: MLB.TV : Amazon Fire TV : Get Started : Get Started Click
pageName: MLB.TV : Amazon Fire TV : Favorite Team Select
action: MLB.TV : Amazon Fire TV : Favorite Team Select : Add CLE (will change according to the team selected)
action: MLB.TV : Amazon Fire TV : Favorite Team Select : Next Click
action: MLB.TV : Amazon Fire TV : Welcome : Create Free Account Click
pageName: MLB.TV : Amazon Fire TV : Create Account
action: MLB.TV : Amazon Fire TV : Welcome : Browse Subscriptions Click (will crash internal build)
pageName: MLB.TV : Amazon Fire TV : Paywall
action: MLB.TV : Amazon Fire TV : Welcome : Log In Click
pageName: MLB.TV : Amazon Fire TV : Log In
action: MLB.TV : Amazon Fire TV : Log In : Log In Submit Click
action: MLB.TV : Amazon Fire TV : Log In : Log In Failure
action: MLB.TV : Amazon Fire TV : Log In : Log In Success
action: MLB.TV : Amazon Fire TV : Welcome : Explore Free Content Click

More information can be found here: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1fpRu27ySNv879rsKQ8po77F9ug-mIn6W-0tZXEFxZJA/edit#gid=225214161

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user changes Hide Spoilers in the Settings to the "On" or "Off" position
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the associated Adobe Analytics call should include a.action: MLB.TV : <Platform Name> : Settings : Hide Spoilers Toggle <On|Off> Click
AND settings.hideSpoilers:true

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN Hide Spoilers is set to "On" or "Off" position 
AND the user is navigating through any part of the app
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN global Adobe Analytics Tracking calls should include settings.hideSpoilers: <true|false>

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user starts an initial VOD/SVOD video
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN tracking logs will indicate video.autoplay=false

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN VOD/SVOD are played
AND the following video begins to play automatically
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN tracking logs will indicate video.autoplay=true

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN VOD/SVOD are played
AND the following video begins to play automatically
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the data for the first video is reported for the the Video Complete tracking action
AND playback events (ie Started, 25%, 50%, 75%, Completed) report the data corresponding to the new video when the new video begins to play
NOTE: Completion events are fired when video is 98% complete

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN VOD/SVOD are played
AND the user clicks the thumbnail for the upcoming video
AND the new video begins to play
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN tracking logs will indicate video.autoplay=true

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN VOD/SVOD are played
AND the user clicks the thumbnail for the upcoming video
AND the new video begins to play
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the Video playback events (ie Started, 25%, 50%, 75%, Completed) report the data corresponding to the new video when the new video begins to play
NOTE: Completion events are fired when video is 98% complete

title: Homepage Autoplay: Analytics
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user on the homescreen
AND media that autoplays for the user is in the hero space
custom_steps: WHEN media in the hero space begins to autoplay
custom_expected:
THEN the following event will be displayed in Tracking logs:
Home : Featured Content : Autoplay Start
AND after the media goes to fullscreen tracking logs will display:
Home : Featured Content : Autoplay to Fullscreen

title: Settings- Autoplay Analytics
custom_steps:
WHEN the user goes to the settings page
AND changes the autoplay setting to ON or OFF
custom_expected:
THEN tracking logs should include the corresponding actions, ie:
a.action: MLB.TV : <Platform Name> : Settings : Autoplay Toggle <On|Off> Click
settings.autoplayEnabled: “true” or “false”

title: Global id.okta
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user that is signed in
custom_expected: THEN id.okta is reported to Adobe analytics

title: Apple TV+/ Peacock blackout message tracking state and tracking action
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an entitled user that is blacked out of Apple TV+/Peacock games

As of 9/29/2022- A peacock feed is available in qa on April 29, 2022 Minnesota Twins @ Tampa Bay Rays and an Apple TV+ feed is available April 1, 2022 Atlanta Braves @ Miami Marlins

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user clicks a live Apple TV+ game
AND the user selects the Apple TV+ feed
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the app redirects to the player
AND the user sees the Apple TV+ blackout message in the player
AND Adobe Analytics tracking state includes "Apple TV+ Modal"

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user dismisses the Apple TV+ blackout message
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Adobe Analytics tracking action includes "Apple TV+ Modal : Dismiss Click"

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user clicks a live Peacock game
AND the user selects the Peacock feed
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the app redirects to the player
AND the user sees the Peacock blackout message in the player
AND Adobe Analytics tracking state includes "Peacock Modal"

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user dismisses the Peacock blackout message
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Adobe Analytics tracking action includes "Peacock Modal : Dismiss Click"

title: VOD/SVOD-carousel tracking
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects VOD/SVOD content from the carousels
custom_expected:
THEN Adobe tracking action is reported for carousel section in every vod selection
AND Adobe tracking action is reported for carousel title in every vod selection
AND Adobe tracking action is reported for video index within the carousel on vod selection
NOTE: look for sectionIndex, sectionTitle, and index

title: Details/Linescore Analytics tracking
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user watching a game in the player

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user navigates to the Details Tab
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN an Adobe tracking action will report "Tracking Action: MLB.TV : Amazon Fire TV : MLB.TV : Video Player : Player Controls : Line Score : Open Click"

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user navigates into the innings section of the Details tab
AND selects a half inning with a click
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Adobe event data will report including the half inning clicked and the space for that innnging eg: "Event Data {action.inningState=BOT 8, action.element.text=1}"

title: Gameday Analytics
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user watching a game on MLBTV in the app

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user enters Gameday mode
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN an Adobe Analytics event reports "Tracking Action: MLB.TV : <Amazon Fire TV/ Android TV> : MLB.TV : Video Player : Player Controls : Gameday Click"

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user is watching Gameday mode
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN an Adobe Analytics event reports "Tracking State: MLB.TV : <Amazon Fire TV/ Android TV>: Gameday"

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user exits Gamdeday mode
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN an Adobe Analytics event reports "Tracking Action: MLB.TV : <Amazon Fire TV/ Android TV> : Gameday : Unload Click"

title: In Game Scoreboard
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is watching a game

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user clicks to open/close games view
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the associated Adobe Analytics call should include a.action:
MLB.TV : <Platform Name> : Video Player : Player Controls : Games <Open|Close> Click

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user clicks on a game
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the associated Adobe Analytics call should include a.action:
MLB.TV : <Platform Name> : Video Player : Games : Game Select Click
<Game PK of Selected Game>

title: Multi-View
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user in the multi-view experience on a day with multiple games to which the user is entitled

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user opens the in-game scoreboard
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN tracking action is sent for "Multiview : Player Controls : Games Open Click"

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user is in the in-game scoreboard
AND the user selects a new game to be added as a stream in multi-view
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN tracking action is sent for "Multiview : Games : Game Select Click"
AND the gamePk of the selected game is included in action.element.gamepk tracking data

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user is in the in-game scoreboard 
AND the user selects a game that is already playing that includes the "Remove" overlay
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN tracking action is sent for "Multiview : Games : Remove Game Click"
AND the gamePk of the selected game is included in action.element.gamepk tracking data

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user is in Multiview
AND makes a button press
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN tracking action is sent for "Multiview : <Button Prompt Text> Click"
AND the gamePk of the button press is included in
action.element.text tracking data

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user is in Multiview
AND moves a game from another player to the primary player
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN tracking action is sent for "Multiview : Select Primary"

AND the gamePk of the select primary action is included in the tracking data at action.element.video.contentType, action.element.video.contentID, action.element.video.title and action.element.video.fguid

AND the tracking data for action.element.index is between 1-3

AND the tracking data for action.element.indexTotal is between 1-3
